heading: Real Connection. Real Change.
intro: I help adults and teens with PTSD, anxiety, depression, trauma, ADHD, and life transitions. Book a free 20‑minute introductory call.

testimonials.quote: From our first session, I felt safe and not judged. Separating thoughts from feelings changed how I cope.
testimonials.name: Anonymous, 28

testimonials.quote: I felt heard and practically helped to sort my thoughts. I’m more comfortable being myself.
testimonials.name: Anonymous, 30
